title: U.S. Flag Watch Face
summary: Provides U.S. Flag Watch Face for round and square Smartwatches
description: Provides U.S. Flag Watch Face for your round or square Smartwatch, as seen on the sample graphic. In the future release there will be a configuration page that will contain options like date display and color of the watch's hands.It may take few minutes for the new watch face to appear. You may want to try tapping "Resync Apps" in the Android Wear App on your phone. If, after doing this, you still don't see the new watch face in your Android Wear app, you can also try rebooting your phone and watch.
descriptionHTML:
Provides U.S. Flag Watch Face for your round or square Smartwatch, as seen on the sample graphic. In the future release there will be a configuration page that will contain options like date display and color of the watch's hands.

It may take few minutes for the new watch face to appear. You may want to try tapping "Resync Apps" in the Android Wear App on your phone. If, after doing this, you still don't see the new watch face in your Android Wear app, you can also try rebooting your phone and watch.
